briefTitle: Extended Niacin/Laropiprant in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (0524A-069)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled 36 Week Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Extended Release (ER) Niacin/Laropiprant in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
summary: A study to assess the efficacy and tolerability of ER (Extended Release) niacin/laropiprant versus placebo in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change at Week (Wk) 12 Compared to Baseline (Bl) in Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes When Compared to Placebo
